ooC: Jer, I'm afraid that you are wrong, I didn't land the ship. =P
I was going to do it, but I was waiting for responses from all of the 
passengers as they wake up. =) I'll land it in a bit.

0oc: Canada did start out as a French colony, Acadia I believe. 
Regardless, Canada would be a better place without the US. Canada 
will get worse as the NAFTA agreement gets older (as I said before). 
As soon as the NAFTA agreement took affect, canada dropped like 2 
places to 6th or something (note: USA is even lower).

Hedge, you'll never be able to convince any knowing Canadian that the 
USA is better, or that Canada is better off with the USA. I will 
admit, however, that the USA is a rich-b*tch country where anyone who 
has money has a 50-50 chance of making it. Pretty terrible 
considering that 45% of the US population are poor.

Finally, enough of these irritating OOC's! Yes, some of them may be 
interesting, but everyone here has a private email that they can use, 
so use it! If worse comes to worse, council will be forced to 
moderate people for taking up board space, and messing up those with 
14.4 modems and such. =P

TRY TO RESTRAIN THOSE OOC POSTING TENDANCIES!


--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> OOC: Actually, rAuq has already landed the Autobot ship. (I think, I
> have been wrong before) :)
